short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get notified for upcoming episodes of your favorite TV series.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage your list of ongoing shows and stay up to date!

Features:
• Searching for TV series and adding them to your list
• Main details about TV series including days until next episode
• Notifications for upcoming episodes
• Options for when to be notified before a new episode
• Light or dark mode based on operating system settings
• No sign up required

Note:
Notifications get triggered when Chrome starts up. If you are not receiving them,
you have most likely kept Chrome open for a longer period of time without restarting it.
Notifications should also be enabled from settings (if they are not already).


NotifyTV uses TV series data provided by TV Maze API (https://www.tvmaze.com/), licensed by CC BY-SA (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/).
